## LocalScenario.addConductor() method

Create and add a conductor to the scenario.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addConductor(signalHandler?: AppSignalCb): Promise<LocalConductor>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signalHandler | AppSignalCb | A callback function to handle signals. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[LocalConductor](./tryorama.localconductor.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The newly added conductor instance.
